verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H250>Ezrahite.<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of the <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> with my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will I make <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2617>Mercy<s%> shall be built <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> shalt thou <S%H3559>establish<s%> in the very <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with my <S%H972>chosen,<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%>

Thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and build <S%H1129>up<s%> thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H6382>wonders,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H6918>saints.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> in the <S%H7834>heaven<s%> can be <S%H6186>compared<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> who among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty<s%> can be <S%H1819>likened<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is <S%H7227>greatly<s%> to be <S%H6206>feared<s%> in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H6918>saints,<s%> and to be had in <S%H3372>reverence<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that are <S%H5439>about<s%> him.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is a <S%H2626>strong<s%> <S%H3050>LORD<s%> like unto <S%H3644>thee?<s%> or to thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> thee?
Thou <S%H859><s%> <S%H4910>rulest<s%> the <S%H1348>raging<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> when the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H7721>arise,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H7623>stillest<s%> them.

Thou <S%H859><s%> hast <S%H1792>broken<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> in pieces, as one that is <S%H2491>slain;<s%> thou hast <S%H6340>scattered<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> with thy <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%>

The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are thine, the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> is thine: as for the <S%H8398>world<s%> and the <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof, <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H3245>founded<s%> them.
The <S%H6828>north<s%> and the <S%H3225>south<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H1254>created<s%> them: <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> and <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> shall <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Thou hast a <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>arm:<s%> <S%H5810>strong<s%> is thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7311>high<s%> is thy right <S%H3225>hand.<s%>

Justice <S%H6664><s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> are the <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of thy <S%H3678>throne:<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> shall <S%H6923>go<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> the joyful <S%H8643>sound:<s%> they shall <S%H1980>walk,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>
In thy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall they <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day:<s%> and in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall they be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of their <S%H5797>strength:<s%> and in thy <S%H7522>favor<s%> our <S%H7161>horn<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is our <S%H4043>defense;<s%> and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is our <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> in <S%H2377>vision<s%> to thy holy <S%H2623>one,<s%> and <S%H559>saidst,<s%> I have <S%H7737>laid<s%> <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> one that is <S%H1368>mighty;<s%> I have <S%H7311>exalted<s%> one <S%H970>chosen<s%> out of the <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>
I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> with my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> have I <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him:
With <S%H5973><s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established:<s%> mine <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> him.
The <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5378>exact<s%> upon him; <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him.
And I will beat <S%H3807>down<s%> his <S%H6862>foes<s%> before his <S%H4480>face,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and <S%H5062>plague<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him.
But my <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and my <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall be <S%H5973>with<s%> him: and in my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall his <S%H7161>horn<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
I will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> in the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto me, <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H1>father,<s%> my <S%H410>God,<s%> and the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Also <S%H637><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5414>make<s%> him my <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H5945>higher<s%> than the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
My <S%H2617>mercy<s%> will I <S%H8104>keep<s%> for him <S%H5769>forevermore,<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall stand <S%H539>fast<s%> with him.
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> also will I <S%H7760>make<s%> to endure <S%H5703>forever,<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in my <S%H4941>judgments;<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> they <S%H2490>break<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>
Then will I <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H5061>stripes.<s%>

Nevertheless my <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will I <S%H3808>not<s%> utterly <S%H6331>take<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> him, <S%H3808>nor<s%> suffer my faithfulness to <S%H8266>fail.<s%> <S%H530><s%>
My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2490>break,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8138>alter<s%> the thing that is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Once <S%H259><s%> have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by my <S%H6944>holiness<s%> that I will <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H3576>lie<s%> unto <S%H1732>David.<s%>
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H1961>endure<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
It shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> as the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and as a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> in <S%H7834>heaven.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But <S%H859>thou<s%> hast cast <S%H2186>off<s%> and <S%H3988>abhorred,<s%> thou hast been <S%H5674>wroth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
Thou hast made <S%H5010>void<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant:<s%> thou hast <S%H2490>profaned<s%> his <S%H5145>crown<s%> by casting it to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
Thou hast broken <S%H6555>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1448>hedges;<s%> thou hast <S%H7760>brought<s%> his <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> to <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> that pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8155>spoil<s%> him: he <S%H1961>is<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to his <S%H7934>neighbors.<s%>
Thou hast set <S%H7311>up<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of his <S%H6862>adversaries;<s%> thou hast made <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> the <S%H6697>edge<s%> of his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and hast <S%H3808>not<s%> made him to <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
Thou hast made his <S%H4480>glory<s%> <S%H2892><s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and <S%H4048>cast<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> down to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
The <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth<s%> hast thou <S%H7114>shortened:<s%> thou hast <S%H5844>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him with <S%H955>shame.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
How <S%H5704>long,<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> wilt thou hide <S%H5641>thyself<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%> shall thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H784>fire?<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2465>short<s%> <S%H589>my<s%> time is: <S%H5921>wherefore<s%> <S%H4100><s%> hast thou <S%H1254>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H120><s%> in <S%H7723>vain?<s%>

What <S%H4310><s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> is he that <S%H2421>liveth,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4194>death?<s%> shall he <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H7585>grave?<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> <S%H346>where<s%> are thy <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses,<s%> which thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> in thy <S%H530>truth?<s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants;<s%> how I do <S%H5375>bear<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom<s%> the reproach of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%>

Wherewith <S%H834><s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H2778>reproached,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
